column8: The singularity is coming! Or is It?  Are we on the cusp of a new stage in human and technological evolution in which reality as we know it will become completely transformed.  Or is it just 'The Rapture for nerds'? This t-shirt uses the data from Ray Kurzweil's Logarithmic graph showing major paradigm shifts and the acceleration through biological and then technological evolution, alongside the equation for Moore's Law with the only certain outcome we can predict at this time.
